overview: From 2025-11-02 to 2025-11-03, ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io had 3 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Add MR_LIGHTSPEED Creator Coin on Base
topPRs.author: MrLightspeed
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- add `data/MR_LIGHTSPEED/data.json` and `logo.svg` for Mr Lightspeed Creator Coin on Base
- include official project website / X handle and keep the listing `nobridge: true` until an L1 deployment exists

## Testing
- `pnpm config set allow-build true`
- `pnpm install`
- `pnpm validate` *(fails: "Cannot find module '@uniswap/token-lists/dist/index.js'" because the package ships source only; building it requires maintainer-approved build scripts)*
- `pnpm lint:check` *(blocked by the missing `@uniswap/token-lists/dist` output)*
- `pnpm build` *(blocked by the same issue)*
- `npx tsdx build --cwd node_modules/@uniswap/token-lists` *(fails: "Incompatible tsconfig option. Module resolves to 'CommonJS'." so the build still needs maintainer intervention)*

CircleCI also reports "No configuration was found" for forks; please ignore that status. Iâ€™m happy to re-run the validator once the dependency build is approved.

## References
- Base contract (verified): https://basescan.org/token/0xf0cb96a4011A0A6F73d100c7080Bf8020D10F87a#code

@tbtstl

topPRs.title: Add MR_LIGHTSPEED Creator Coin on Base
topPRs.author: MrLightspeed
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- add metadata + logo for Mr Lightspeed Creator Coin on Base only
- include official website/social handles and mark the token `nobridge: true` until an L1 deployment exists

## Testing
- `pnpm config set allow-build true`
- `pnpm install`
- `pnpm validate` *(fails: "Cannot find module '@uniswap/token-lists/dist/index.js'" because pnpm build scripts for dependencies require maintainer approval; same issue affects forked PRs)*
- `pnpm lint:check` *(blocked by the validation failure above)*
- `pnpm build` *(blocked by the validation failure above)*

CircleCI currently reports "No configuration was found" on community forks; please treat that status as informational. Happy to rerun `pnpm validate` once the build scripts are approved or to provide additional logs.

## References
- Base contract (verified): https://basescan.org/token/0xf0cb96a4011a0a6f73d100c7080bf8020d10f87a#code
